content: minecraft axolotl supplies 5 mm crochet hook sewing needle stuffing yarn o light pink big twist light rose o dark pink red heart light raspberry o dark purple big twist grape could also use black only need a little optional small knitting needles stitch glossary single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase 2 single_crochet in 1 stitch inc3 = increase 3 3 single_crochet in 1 stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet scbp = single_crochet back post hdbp = half_double_crochet back post st3bptg = stitch 1 scbp 1 hdbp and 1 scbps together corner series = in a single stitch on the corner of your square crochet a single_crochet a half_double_crochet and another single_crochet all in that same stitch this creates a distinct corner st3tog = stitch 3 scs together slip_stitch = slip_stitch invisible color changes there are a few color changes throughout this pattern to keep the colors from two adjacent but different colored stitches from look messy do an invisible color change let s say you re switching from yellow to black during your last yellow stitch gather all the loops of yarn required by the specific stitch type you are doing on your hook in yellow except for the very last loop yarn over in black yarn for this very last loop and pull it through all the yellow loops on your hook to finish off your stitch the crochet stitch you just finished will still be all yellow but the loop on your hook will be black now you are ready to crochet your first black stitch below is an example of finishing off a last yellow single_crochet stitch before a color change important joining rounds this pattern is not crocheted in a spiral in order for the shapes in this pattern to end up where they are intended to go you must follow these steps to finish off a round and start the next round 1 after finishing the last stitch in a round slip_stitch into the first stitch pink of that same round 2 chain 1 and pull on the back side blue of the loop of yarn left on your hook to tighten the chain you just did into what will look almost like a knot you are ready for the first stitch of the next round the last picture shows a first stitch in the next round 3 this round join does not count as one of the stitches called for by the pattern for each row it is done in addition to all the stitches called out in the pattern head and body to start the face use light pink round 1 using doubled up yarn chain 4 drop one of the ends of yarn and do two more chains then pull on the back loop to tighten this chain round 2 single_crochet one into each of the doubled-up chains 4 chain then tighten round 3 do both a half_double_crochet and a single_crochet into the last single_crochet you just did into the doubled-up chain below
